landing.intro: IN05 is a collaborative project by an emergent network of hackers, artists, and punks in Tokyo.

new-recruitment.title: Membership Recruitment: Seeking New Members
new-recruitment.description: We are recruiting new members to the IN05 network. New members can also opt to be residents of the IN05 house, located in the center of Tokyo. IN05 house is a co-residential space for our members to create a mutually empowering environment and lifestyle.
new-recruitment.why-description: IN05 network is an emergent, interdisciplinary, collaborative project founded by three members who shared a passion for technology, entrepreneurship, and music. We opened our first base of operations in Jan '24, starting as a co-residential space in the heart of Metropolitan Tokyo. Our team is expanding to open a second base of operations, located in the outskirts of Metropolitan tokyo. To support this strategic expansion, we also intend to recruit a few new members to the IN05 crew.
new-recruitment.ideal-candidates-description: We are looking for young professionals (18-29 yrs), with a strong passion for personal growth and collaborative living. We welcome individuals from diverse backgrounds, including but not limited to:
new-recruitment.core-values: Our members share the following core values:
core-values-list: Eager to contribute to a vibrant community
Committed to a sustainable and exciting lifestyle
new-recruitment.final-remarks: Join us in creating a dynamic, supportive environment where ideas flourish, and lifelong connections are forged. Whether you're a coder, a creator, or a changemaker, if you have something special to bring to the table, there's a place for you in the IN05 community.
